long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you find yourself being distracted by YouTube Shorts, doom scrolling aimlessly for hours on end? Is your subscription feed cluttered with Shorts that you aren't interested in? Pants hides YouTube Shorts from your subscription feed and returns the focus to videos.
